metadata.name: Gyg #1
metadata.description:
My mother is a painter. This was painted by one of her art students offline. Think he got inspiration from another artist so the work is not 'original'. GYG is a man close to his 70s. A random encounter with our family had him get immersed into the world of art and painting. 

I wanted to share his journey with you.

All ETH made goes to the artist.

Artist: GYG
Paint: Acrylic paint

With love from Seoul
